email.title: DoCSoc End of Year Dinner
email.text:
It is time for the final DoCSoc event of the year, our annual End Of Year Dinner! Join us at Bluebird Chelsea on 17th June at 7pm for an exciting evening filled with food, drink and dance.
Upon arrival, you will be welcomed with a champagne reception followed by a three-course meal along with wine or beer.
So pick out your best dresses/suits for this glamorous, black tie evening and together we hope to make it an extremely memorable night!
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
Tickets -
Tickets will be released at the following times: - Early Bird: Thursday 30th May at 11AM - Standard Release: **TO BE ANNOUNCED** - Late Release: **TO BE ANNOUNCED**
Ticket prices for all batches will be £25.
You may purchase a +1 ticket for anyone from any department (or external), but tickets are limited to two per member across all sales.
To purchase early bird tickets please head to [this Eventbrite page](https://docsoc-end-of-year-dinner.eventbrite.co.uk) at 11AM to buy your **placeholder ticket**. To **secure and pay** for your ticket, then head to [this Union website page](https://www.imperialcollegeunion.org/shop/club-society-project-products/computing-products/27060/docsoc-end-of-year-dinner-2019) BEFORE 1pm.
Your Eventbrite ticket will be cancelled if you don't secure the ticket from the Union website.
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
Terms and Conditions -
The event is DoCSoc only, and is strictly 18+. Entry may be refused without a valid government-issued ID. You must have been a member of DoCSoc before 30th May in order to attend.
